page.title: 15Cotswold Line Promotion
page.content: The railway line which runs along the South section of the survey area in the main Hereford to London line.The Herefrd to Oxford section is mainly single tracked.Much of the line on the flood plane below Wood Norton has been built up on an embackment above the flood plain.This has to be repaired regularly due to subsidence. The Cotswold Line Promotion Group formed in March 1978.They had aims of promoting and publicising bus and train feeder communications between Oxford and Worcester.The Group thinks that a service of "Inter-City" and Local Services is important to the future of the railway.The line is at risk and the Group is tyring to get more passenger and freight use so no more downgrading or closure may happen.
